document.full_text: transcanada corp was restoring operations on sunday along the keystone crude oil pipeline, one week after it was shut by a leak at a kansas pumping station, a company spokesman said.
document.title: transcanada restarting keystone oil pipeline
lines_and_colors: transcanada corp was restoring operations on sunday along the keystone crude oil pipeline, one week after it was shut by a leak at a kansas pumping station, a company spokesman said.
